committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill to name a United States Post Office in the vicinity of Lancaster, Pennsylvania, the "Edwin D. Eshleman Post Office".

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the U.S. Post Office Building in the vicinity of Lancaster, Pennsylvania, as the Edwin D. Eshleman Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to name a United States Post Office in the vicinity of Lancaster, Pennsylvania, the "Edwin D. Eshleman Post Office".
